title: Mouse pointer disappears in edit mode when the background is White
author: ravirxz
body_snippet:
<!-- Bug -->
|||
|--:|---|
|Operating system | Windows 10 x64 | Windows 2008 / 2012 R2 
|mRemoteNG version| 1.75 aplha 3  |

When opening a file to edit in notepad++ the mouse pointer disappears and makes it difficult to select a line or a field. The only way to select would be to do a select +all and due to the selection being grey the mouse appears. after select the required the mouse disappears again.
